00032 static const char* NODE_NAME_CONVERSION_TABLE = "ConversionTable";
00033 static const char* NODE_NAME_CONVERSION = "Conversion";
00034 static const char* NODE_NAME_COLUMNS_CLONING = "ColumnsCloning";
00035 static const char* NODE_NAME_DBCLONE = "DbClone";
00036 static const char* NODE_NAME_CSVCOLUMN = "CsvColumn";
00037 static const char* NODE_NAME_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS = "ColumnDefinitions";
00038 static const char* NODE_NAME_COLUMN = "Column";
00039 static const char* NODE_NAME_ALTERNATIVE_COLUMN_MAPPINGS = "AlternativeColumnMappings";
00040 static const char* NODE_NAME_ALTERNATIVE_COLUMN_MAPPING = "AlternativeColumnMapping";
00041 static const char* NODE_NAME_CDF_INFORMATION_TABLE_ROW = "CdfInformationTableRow";
00042 static const char* NODE_NAME_CDF_INFORMATION_TABLE = "CdfInformationTable";
00043 static const char* NODE_NAME_PREFIX =  "Prefix";
00044 
00045 static const char* HEADER_VARIABLE_TO_MATCH = "HeaderVariableToMatch";
00046 static const char* HEADER_VARIABLES_TO_MATCH = "HeaderVariablesToMatch";
00047 static const char* RESERVED_HEADER_VARIABLE = "ReservedHeaderVariable";
00048 static const char* RESERVED_HEADER_VARIABLES = "ReservedHeaderVariables";

00051 // Note: This relies on w_char being implemented as 16bit ints - NOT PORTABLE
00052 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME = "columnName";
00053 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_CSVVALUE = "csvValue";
00054 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_DBVALUE =  "dbValue";
00055 
00056 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_REQUIREMENT_TYPE = "requirementType";
00057 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_SEVERITY =  "severity";
00058 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_MESSAGE =  "message";
00059 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_PREFIX =  "prefix";
00060 
00061 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_NAME = "name";
00062 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_VALUE = "value";
00063 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_CSV_COLUMN_NAME = "csvColumnName";
00064 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_DB_COLUMN_NAME = "dbColumnName";
00065 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_DELETE = "delete";
00066 static const char* ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_TYPE = "columnType";

00068 ConfigFileHandler::ConfigFileHandler(Configuration* Config)
00069 {    
00070     m_inCloning = false;    
00071     m_configuration = Config;
00072     
00073     m_cdfInformationTableRows.push_back("filename");
00074     m_cdfInformationTableRows.push_back("guid");
00075     m_cdfInformationTableRows.push_back("checksum");
00076     m_cdfInformationTableRows.push_back("version");
00077 
00078 }
00079 
00080 std::string ConfigFileHandler::GetAttrib(const Attributes& Attrs, const char* AttribName)
00081 {
00082     return GetAttrib(Attrs, AttribName, true);
00083 }
00084 std::string ConfigFileHandler::GetAttrib(const Attributes& Attrs, const char* AttribName, bool ReturnEmptyStringIfNull)
00085 {
00086     // Convert char* to XMLCh*
00087     XMLCh* xAttribName = XMLString::transcode(AttribName);
00088     // get XMLCh* result
00089     const XMLCh* valuePtr = Attrs.getValue(xAttribName);
00090     // release the attr name
00091     XMLString::release(&xAttribName);
00092     // check for missing attr
00093      if (NULL == valuePtr)
00094      {
00095         if (ReturnEmptyStringIfNull)
00096         {
00097             return "";
00098         }
00099         else
00100         {
00101             return NULL;            
00102         }
00103      }          
00104      return  ToStdString(valuePtr);     
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool ConfigFileHandler::IsDeleteAtribSet(const Attributes& Attrs)
00108 {     
00109      if (GetAttrib(Attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_DELETE) == "yes")
00110      {
00111         return true;
00112      }
00113      return false;
00114 }
00115 void ConfigFileHandler::AddOrRemoveRequiredColumn(std::map<string, RequiredColumn> &ColumnDefinitions, const Attributes& Attrs)
00116 {
00117     bool deleteValue = IsDeleteAtribSet(Attrs);
00118     m_lastColumnName = GetAttrib(Attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME);
00119            
00120     std::map<string, RequiredColumn>::iterator found = ColumnDefinitions.find(m_lastColumnName);
00121         
00122     if (deleteValue)
00123     {
00124         if (found != ColumnDefinitions.end())
00125         {
00126             ColumnDefinitions.erase(found);
00127         }
00128     }
00129     else
00130     {// add or update           
00131         SeverityLevel severity = Error;
00132         
00133         string severityAttribValue = GetAttrib(Attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_SEVERITY);
00134         if (severityAttribValue == "warning")
00135         {
00136             severity = Warning;
00137         }
00138         else if (severityAttribValue == "information")
00139         {
00140             severity = Information;
00141         }                
00142         
00143         if (found == ColumnDefinitions.end())
00144         {// Add  
00145             RequiredColumn requiredColumn;
00146             requiredColumn.Message = GetAttrib(Attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_MESSAGE);
00147             requiredColumn.Severity = severity;
00148             ColumnDefinitions.insert(std::make_pair(m_lastColumnName,requiredColumn));
00149         }
00150         else
00151         {// update
00152             found->second.Message = GetAttrib(Attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_MESSAGE);            
00153             found->second.Severity = severity;
00154         }
00155     }     
00156 }
00157 void ConfigFileHandler::AddOrRemoveValue(std::vector<string> &Vertor, const Attributes& Attrs, const char* AttribName, bool FixHeaderVar)
00158 {     
00159      
00160      bool deleteValue = IsDeleteAtribSet(Attrs);
00161      
00162      // Get AttribName Value     
00163      XMLCh* xAttribName = XMLString::transcode(AttribName);
00164      const XMLCh* valuePtr = Attrs.getValue(xAttribName);
00165      // release the attr name
00166      XMLString::release(&xAttribName);
00167 
00168      string value;
00169           
00170      if (valuePtr != NULL)
00171      {
00172         value = ToStdString(valuePtr);
00173         std::vector<string>::iterator found =  find(Vertor.begin(),Vertor.end(), value);
00174             
00175         if (deleteValue)
00176         {
00177             if (found != Vertor.end())
00178             {
00179                 Vertor.erase(found);
00180             }
00181         }
00182         else
00183         {   
00184             if (found == Vertor.end())
00185             {
00186                 if (FixHeaderVar)
00187                 {
00188                     StringUtilities::FixHeaderVarName(value);
00189                 }
00190                 Vertor.push_back(value);
00191             }
00192         }
00193      }
00194      //          
00195 }
00196 void ConfigFileHandler::startElement(const XMLCh* const uri, const XMLCh* const localname,
00197                                      const XMLCh* const qname, const Attributes& attrs)
00198 {
00199     std::string nodeName = ToStdString(qname);
00200     
00201     if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_CONVERSION)
00202     {
00203         std::string columnName = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME);
00204         std::string csvValue = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_CSVVALUE);
00205         std::string dbValue = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_DBVALUE);
00206         
00207         CsvToDbConversionMap::iterator pos = m_configuration->m_csvToDbConversionMap.find(columnName);
00208         if ( pos == m_configuration->m_csvToDbConversionMap.end())
00209         {            
00210             // Add new map for this column
00211             map<string,string> conversionMap;
00212             conversionMap.insert(make_pair(csvValue,dbValue));
00213             m_configuration->m_csvToDbConversionMap.insert(make_pair(columnName, conversionMap));            
00214         }
00215         else
00216         {
00217             if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00218             {
00219                 m_configuration->m_csvToDbConversionMap.erase(pos);
00220             }
00221             else
00222             {
00223                 m_configuration->m_csvToDbConversionMap[columnName].insert(make_pair(csvValue,dbValue));
00224             }
00225         }
00226     }
00227     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_CONVERSION_TABLE)          
00228     {
00229         if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00230         {
00231            m_configuration->m_csvToDbConversionMap.clear();
00232         }        
00233     }
00234     else if (nodeName == HEADER_VARIABLES_TO_MATCH)
00235     {
00236         if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00237         {
00238             m_configuration->m_varsToMatch.clear();
00239         }
00240     }
00241     else if (nodeName == HEADER_VARIABLE_TO_MATCH)
00242     {
00243         AddOrRemoveValue(m_configuration->m_varsToMatch, attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_NAME, true);        
00244     }    
00245     else if (nodeName == RESERVED_HEADER_VARIABLES)
00246     {
00247         if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00248         {
00249             m_configuration->m_reservedVars.clear();
00250         }
00251     }
00252     else if (nodeName == RESERVED_HEADER_VARIABLE)
00253     {
00254         AddOrRemoveValue(m_configuration->m_reservedVars, attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_NAME, false);        
00255     }  
00256     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_COLUMNS_CLONING)
00257     {
00258         m_inCloning = true;
00259         if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00260         {
00261             m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.clear();
00262         }
00263     }    
00264     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_CSVCOLUMN && m_inCloning)
00265     {               
00266             m_columnNameToClone = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME);
00267             if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00268             {
00269                 ColumnsCloningMap::iterator columnsIterator = m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.find(m_columnNameToClone);
00270                 if (columnsIterator != m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.end())
00271                 {
00272                     m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.erase(columnsIterator);           
00273                 }              
00274             }
00275     }
00276     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_DBCLONE && m_inCloning)
00277     {               
00278         string cloneName = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME);
00279         string cloneType = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_TYPE);
00280         if (cloneType.empty())
00281         {
00282             cloneType = DB_TYPE_TEXT;
00283         }
00284             
00285         std::vector<string> columns;        
00286             if (false == m_configuration->IsCloneableColumn(m_columnNameToClone)) // Check if it wasn't added
00287             {           
00288                 m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.insert(std::make_pair(m_columnNameToClone , columns));
00289             }
00290             
00291             ColumnsCloningMap::iterator columnsIterator = m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.find(m_columnNameToClone);
00292             if (columnsIterator != m_configuration->m_columnsCloning.end())
00293             {                       
00294             columnsIterator->second.push_back(cloneName);                        
00295             }       
00296             
00297             map<string, string>::iterator columnTypes = m_configuration->m_cloneColumnTypes.find(cloneName);        
00298         if (columnTypes == m_configuration->m_cloneColumnTypes.end())
00299         {            
00300             m_configuration->m_cloneColumnTypes.insert(std::make_pair(cloneName, cloneType));
00301         }
00302             
00303     }    
00304     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS)          
00305     {
00306         if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00307         {
00308             m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsPresence.clear();
00309             m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue.clear();
00310             m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues.clear();
00311             m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.clear();
00312         }        
00313     }
00314     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_COLUMN)          
00315     {
00316         
00317         string columnType = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_TYPE);
00318         string columnName = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME);
00319         if (columnName.empty())
00320         {
00321             throw Except("One of the 'Column' nodes has missing or empty 'columnName' attribute!");
00322         }
00323         if (false == columnType.empty())
00324         {
00325             if (false == (DB_TYPE_TEXT == columnType || DB_TYPE_REAL == columnType || DB_TYPE_INTEGER == columnType))
00326             {
00327                 std::stringstream message;
00328                 message << " Column Type '" << columnType << "' is incorrect! ";
00329                 message << "Must be '" << DB_TYPE_REAL << "', '" << DB_TYPE_INTEGER << "' or '" << DB_TYPE_TEXT << "'.";
00330                 throw Except(message.str().c_str()); 
00331             }
00332             
00333             string columnName = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_COLUMN_NAME);
00334             if (false == columnName.empty())
00335             {
00336                 m_configuration->m_columnTypes.insert(std::make_pair(columnName,columnType));
00337             }   
00338         }
00339         string requirementTypeAttribValue = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_REQUIREMENT_TYPE);
00340         
00341         if (requirementTypeAttribValue == "Presence")
00342         {
00343             AddOrRemoveRequiredColumn(m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsPresence, attrs);
00344         }
00345         else if (requirementTypeAttribValue == "SomeValue")
00346         {
00347             AddOrRemoveRequiredColumn(m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue, attrs);
00348         }
00349         else if (requirementTypeAttribValue == "NoEmptyValues")
00350         {
00351             AddOrRemoveRequiredColumn(m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues, attrs);            
00352         }
00353         else if (requirementTypeAttribValue == "PrefixCheck")
00354         {
00355             AddOrRemoveRequiredColumn(m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck, attrs);            
00356         }
00357     }    
00358     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_PREFIX)
00359     {
00360         if (m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.size() > 0)
00361         {
00362             m_configuration->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck[m_lastColumnName].Prefixes.push_back(GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_VALUE));
00363         }
00364     }
00365     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_ALTERNATIVE_COLUMN_MAPPINGS)
00366     {
00367         if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00368         {
00369             m_configuration->m_alternativeColumnMappings.clear();
00370         }
00371     }    
00372     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_ALTERNATIVE_COLUMN_MAPPING)          
00373     {                
00374         string csvColumnName = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_CSV_COLUMN_NAME);
00375         string dbColumnName = GetAttrib(attrs, ATTRIB_NAME_DB_COLUMN_NAME);
00376         
00377         map<string, string>::iterator pos = m_configuration->m_alternativeColumnMappings.find(csvColumnName);
00378         if (pos != m_configuration->m_alternativeColumnMappings.end())
00379         { // found
00380             if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00381             {
00382                 m_configuration->m_alternativeColumnMappings.erase(pos);
00383             }
00384             else
00385             { // Update
00386                 pos->second = dbColumnName;
00387             }
00388         }
00389         else
00390         {
00391             if (false == IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00392             {
00393                 m_configuration->m_alternativeColumnMappings.insert(std::make_pair(csvColumnName, dbColumnName));
00394             }
00395         }
00396     }    
00397     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_CDF_INFORMATION_TABLE)
00398     {
00399          if (IsDeleteAtribSet(attrs))
00400          {
00401             m_configuration->m_cdfInformationTable.clear();
00402          }
00403     }
00404     else if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_CDF_INFORMATION_TABLE_ROW)
00405     {   
00406         map<string, string> cdfInformationTableRow;
00407         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_cdfInformationTableRows.size(); i++)
00408         {
00409             std::string a = m_cdfInformationTableRows[i];
00410             cdfInformationTableRow.insert(std::make_pair(a, GetAttrib(attrs, m_cdfInformationTableRows[i])));
00411         }  
00412                  
00413         m_configuration->m_cdfInformationTable.push_back(cdfInformationTableRow);
00414     }    
00415     
00416 };
00417  
00418  void ConfigFileHandler::endElement (const XMLCh* const uri, const XMLCh* const localname, const XMLCh* const qname)
00419  {
00420     std::string nodeName = ToStdString(qname);
00421     if (nodeName == NODE_NAME_COLUMNS_CLONING)
00422     {
00423         m_inCloning = false;
00424     }
00425  };

00428 
00429 std::string ConfigFileHandler::ToStdString(const XMLCh* const in) 
00430 {
00431     char* p = XMLString::transcode(in);
00432     std::string str = p;
00433     XMLString::release(&p);
00434     return str;
00435 }
